Forces the status bar to show when rotated in landscape.
IMPORTANT NOTE: This patch causes an issue with landscape capturing in the Camera app. If this is a deal breaker or you're experiencing other adverse side effects... then just duplicate this patch on an app specific basis.
[v.2] Tested with an iP6+ 9.0.2. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (1-31-16)
⚑ UPDATES: (1-29-16) *Initial release (1-31-16) *Fixed crashing/visual bug
(9-15-16) *Thank you to /u/Musicisevil for reporting the landscape Camera app issue
